meta.title: Woodburn Bank - Trusted Financial Solutions
meta.description: Experience personalized banking with Woodburn Bank. From home loans to credit cards, we offer a range of financial products designed to meet your needs.

hero.title: Banking Built on <highlight>Trust & Expertise</highlight>
hero.subtitle: For over five decades, <highlight>Woodburn Bank</highlight> has provided reliable financial solutions with personalized service and unwavering commitment to our community.

products.title: Comprehensive Financial Solutions
products.subtitle: From everyday banking to major life investments, we provide the expertise and personalized service you deserve.

item1.title: Home Loans
item1.description: Competitive rates and expert guidance for your home purchase

item2.title: Credit Cards
item2.description: Reward programs with no annual fees and fraud protection

item3.title: Auto Loans
item3.description: Flexible financing for your daily drive

trustIndicators.title: Why Woodburn Bank?
trustIndicators.subtitle: Built on a foundation of trust, stability, and community commitment

item1.title: Security First
item1.description: FDIC insured deposits, advanced encryption, and comprehensive fraud protection keep your money and information secure.

item2.title: Personal Service
item2.description: Dedicated relationship managers who know your name and understand your financial goals and aspirations.

item3.title: Community Focused
item3.description: Locally owned and operated, we reinvest in our community and support local businesses and families.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Better Banking?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us with their financial future.

meta.title: Application Submitted - Woodburn Bank - Trusted Financial Solutions
meta.description: Experience personalized banking with Woodburn Bank. From home loans to credit cards, we offer a range of financial products designed to meet your needs.

header.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
header.subtitle: Thank you for applying for a home loan with Woodburn Bank.

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
nextSteps.description: Here's what you can expect in the coming days:

cards.title: Within 24 Hours
cards.description: You'll receive a confirmation email with your application details and next steps.

cards.title: Within 2-3 Days
cards.description: A loan officer will contact you to discuss your application and may request additional documents.

cards.title: Within 5-7 Days
cards.description: You'll receive a preliminary decision on your loan application.

contact.title: Need help?
contact.description: Our loan specialists are here to answer any questions you may have.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
tips: Your application is not yet approved. Final approval is subject to underwriting review.
You may be asked to provide additional documentation to verify your information.
Interest rates are subject to change until your loan is locked in.
All loan approvals are conditional and subject to final verification.

within1HourCard.title: Within 1 Hour
within1HourCard.content: You'll receive an instant pre-approval decision or a request for additional information.

sameDayCard.title: Same Day
sameDayCard.content: If approved, you'll receive your pre-approval letter and can start shopping with confidence.

atPurchaseCard.title: At Purchase
atPurchaseCard.content: Bring your pre-approval to any dealer and we'll handle the final paperwork and funding.

benefitsList: Shop at any dealer with confidence

contactInfo.title: Need Help or Have Questions?

importantReminders.title: Important Reminders
remindersList: Your pre-approval is valid for 60 days from today
Avoid making major credit changes during this period
Bring your pre-approval letter when shopping for vehicles
Contact us immediately when you find your vehicle
